name: Nonogram Minimal
description:
- Play 200 hand-crafted puzzles, from 5x5 to 25x25
- Beautiful colorful and monochrome images
- Random puzzle generator for infinite fun
- Show your creativity in Level editor
- Share and play user-made puzzles
- Relaxing music
intro: Enjoy 200 hand-crafted puzzles, share and play user-made levels!
